verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, give ear <S%H238><s%> to my supplications <S%H8469><s%>: in thy faithfulness <S%H530><s%> answer <S%H6030><s%> me, and in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.
And enter <S%H935><s%> not into judgment <S%H4941><s%> with thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: for in thy sight <S%H6440><s%> shall no man living <S%H2416><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%>.

For the enemy <S%H341><s%> hath persecuted <S%H7291><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>; he hath smitten <S%H1792><s%> my life <S%H2416><s%> down <S%H1792><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>; he hath made me to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in darkness <S%H4285><s%>, as those that have been long <S%H5769><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%>.
Therefore is my spirit <S%H7307><s%> overwhelmed <S%H5848><s%> within me; my heart <S%H3820><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> me is desolate <S%H8074><s%>.

I remember <S%H2142><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of old <S%H6924><s%>; I meditate <S%H1897><s%> on all thy works <S%H6467><s%>; I muse <S%H7878><s%> on the work <S%H4639><s%> of thy hands <S%H3027><s%>.
I stretch forth <S%H6566><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> unto thee: my soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsteth after thee, as a thirsty <S%H5889><s%> land <S%H776><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me speedily <S%H4118><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>: my spirit <S%H7307><s%> faileth <S%H3615><s%>: hide <S%H5641><s%> not thy face <S%H6440><s%> from me, lest I be like <S%H4911><s%> unto them that go down <S%H3381><s%> into the pit <S%H953><s%>. lest: or, for I am become like, etc

Cause me to hear <S%H8085><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>; for in thee do I trust <S%H982><s%>: cause me to know <S%H3045><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> wherein <S%H2098><s%> I should walk <S%H3212><s%>; for I lift up <S%H5375><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> unto thee.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, from mine enemies <S%H341><s%>: I flee unto thee to hide <S%H3680><s%> me. flee: Heb. hide me with thee

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to do <S%H6213><s%> thy will <S%H7522><s%>; for thou art my God <S%H430><s%>: thy spirit <S%H7307><s%> is good <S%H2896><s%>; lead <S%H5148><s%> me into the land <S%H776><s%> of uprightness <S%H4334><s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, for thy name's <S%H8034><s%> sake: for thy righteousness' <S%H6666><s%> sake bring <S%H3318><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> out of trouble <S%H6869><s%>.
And of thy mercy <S%H2617><s%> cut off <S%H6789><s%> mine enemies <S%H341><s%>, and destroy <S%H6><s%> all them that afflict <S%H6887><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>: for I am thy servant <S%H5650><s%>.
